TopicTitle: Has anybody got the maps for SCANsat?

Articles.Content: I really like SCANsat and the possibility for its usage in mission planning and execution, but I'm too lazy to send sattelites everywhere and wait until they have mapped the planets. Is it possible to download the maps somewhere (or can anybody give them to me) and somehow put them into the mod folder so that I can start out with all maps loaded?

Last time I looked the data (or at least part of it) was stored in the save file so adding it to a game would require editing it into the persistence file. Actually just replacing the entire SCANcontroller scenario (in the save file) may be the easiest way - highly recommend backing the file up before hand. An alternate way to get this (scenario data) would be to start another game, hyperedit a scansatt probe into orbit of each body and time warp. Disclaimer - no guarantee all the data is in the save file.
You can go here if you just want maps http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

12 hours ago, wasml said:

Last time I looked the data (or at least part of it) was stored in the save file so adding it to a game would require editing it into the persistence file.

SCANsat gives you the option to export a map as an image file. That's probably what the OP was after.
